item.description:
Autumn Wine Celebration Saturday, November 3, 2007 6PM - 9PM

Join us for an unforgetable evening of Wine, Great Food, and Live Jazz Music. Whether you drink red or white, with over 30 different Wine Companies represented there will be something for everyone! Also, there will be several local fine restaurants on hand sampling some of their finest entrees and Live Jazz Music throughout the evening.

Enjoy more than 200 wines
Enjoy a sampling of excellent food from local restaurants
Listen to live jazz music while you taste!
Participate in a Silent Auction to benefit the American Red Cross
Selections of wine from Robert Mondavi, Rodney Strong, Hess Collection, Fetzer, Yellowtail, Willow Ridge, CK Mondavi, Crane Lake, Forest Glen, Moet, Hedges, Trinchero Estates and many more!


Admission Advance Online Door
Adult $30 $40
http://wawa.wachusett...
Order your tickets Online

With your admission ticket you'll receive 2 Food Tasting Tickets. You may also purchase additional Tasting Tickets for $3 each or 5 for $10

We can meet at Price Chopper on W. Mountain St in Worcester to car pool.
item.name: Autumn Wine Festival
